Kedar,

Thank you for your question. We included the junit.* classes in JUnit 4 for
compatibility only, so we don't include them in the javadoc. I assumed that
people would be using JUnit 4 to use the new architecture, and that people
maintaining older tests would already know about the old architecture. Is
this causing you problems?

Sincerely yours,

Kent Beck
Three Rivers Institute

> -----Original Message-----
> From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On

> Subject: [junit] junit 4.0 download -- javadoc ...
> 
> I just downloaded junit 4.0 zip.
> The javadoc section does not contain javadoc for junit package (e.g.
> junit.framework). Am I missing something?
> 
> Thanks,
> Kedar
